Reviews.Title: “Well positioned”
Reviews.Author: SabrillaLilla
Reviews.Content: location close ubahn shopping alley ok pretty oldfashioned clean apart noisy guests sleeping staff replied kindly didnt solve broken window broken bed choice breakfast limited standard quality bread freshly baked wifi telephone contact reception hall stairs shared people living building ok

Reviews.Title: “Honest”
Reviews.Author: mirvera
Reviews.Content: hotel basic located near shops restaurants metro station close hotel plus regular bathroom ok reasonably clean entrances main reception meters personnel professional hand easy youre looking cheap hotel berlin definitely suggest average price double €40 wifi cost 5 euros acceptable

Reviews.Title: “Quiet, slightly shabby, comfortable.”
Reviews.Author: Ryanair_fan
Reviews.Content: 17 yo daughter 52 yo male travelled berlin 3 night break booked 3 days arrive booked available dates budget reasonable reviews breakfast provided cost hotel quiet street kdamm west close ubahn receptionist polite friendly offered visa card pay invoice pay cash couldnt accepted visa card grace twin 3rd floor careworn perfectly clean light curtains morning light shower clean beds comfortable tea coffee tv picture poor breakfast standard fare ham boiled eggs cheese yoghurt rolls fruit etc reception 24 hour staff appeared russian apart fellow guests speak loudly slam doors etc 0600 hotel pleasantly quiet day night loved lift

HotelInfo.Name: Arta Lenz Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Xantener Strasse 8, 10707 Berlin, Germany
